arm.transformationDescription:
Within a matter of moments, the skin around [npc.her] arms feel loose. [npc.she] [npc.verb(look)] at [npc.her] arms and [npc.verb(notice)] they look like pale streched gloves. As [npc.she] [npc.verb(move)] [npc.her] arms [npc.she] [npc.verb(see)] small holes on [npc.her] arms getting bigger and bigger slowly revealing new skin consisting of [npc.armFullDescription].
As the final pieces skin fall off, [npc.nameIsFull] left with feral four thingered arms, [style.boldDog(deep sea snapper arms and hands)], which are [npc.materialDescriptor] [npc.armFullDescription].
arm.bodyDescription: [npc.She] [npc.has] [npc.armRows] arms, which are [npc.materialCompositionDescriptor] [npc.armFullDescription(true)]. [npc.Her] hands have formed into four fingered snapper hands, complete with sharp claws and tough, scaly palms.
